div.sent: They are very negligible things.
Try, if you can make some nice things with these rejected feathers.
Using your imaginations, thought and eagerness.
Take while feathers, colour them separately dissolving red, yellow, purple etc. colours into water, colour long while feathers of hens with green and some yellow.
Let them dry and collect some green, blue, blackish green feathers of hens and clean them after selecting.
Make a circular object with a green little bit hard paper like a one taka.
If green paper is not available then white paper will do, but it will have to be coloured and dried.
Cut one part of the circular thing to the middle point.
Then join it to another with strong gum (Look at the picture).
Look (angle) a slantng hile in the middle of the circular thing.
Now fix any coloured small feathers spreading like the petals of flowers in this angle hole with gum.
Look how beautiful it looks like a flower after putting feathers around the angle-hole.
The stick should be inserted into the ball and must be fixed tightly.
Put aika gum well under the ball before inserting the stick into the flower, so that it is attached very well with the flower.
Then put gum around the whole stick and wrap a green paper nicely on it.
If, two-three greenish blue, blackish green feathers are put with green feathers it will look very beautiful.
Wrap with given paper the joint areas of feathers where the gum can be seen after joining all leaves.
Now look, what a beautiful flower with stem and leaves has been made of feathers.
If various coloured-flowers can be made and kept in a flower-vase they will look very beautiful.
A process of making the flower with feathers has been shown here.
Now its your turn to make other kinds of flowers or other things with your skill and to your liking.
